title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL results in an HTTP response code of 200 OK with no content, rather than the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When a URL is accessed on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP response code of 200 OK with no content.
EB: The Tomcat server should return an HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed on a Tomcat instance with no webapps deployed.
SR: To fix this issue, the server should be modified to return the appropriate HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed on a Tomcat instance with no webapps deployed.
